verbose_text: Although selective SMN restoration in motor neurons of SMA+ SMN (ChAT-Cre) mice did not have any benefit, SMN expression in proprioceptive neurons of SMA+ SMN (PV-Cre) mice reduced the synaptic depression of the monosynaptic reflex to WT levels (XREF_FIG and XREF_FIG), confirming that this experimental approach distinguishes the presynaptic contribution of proprioceptive neurotransmission in SMA.
